title: My-Portfolio
description: This is the first site where I put lots of effort while designing it and after doing it the way it looks makes me feel proud on myself ;)

title: Art meet web3
description: Developed a sleek and user-friendly frontend for an NFT website using Tailwind CSS and Next.js, harnessing Next.js's built-in SEO capabilities alongside responsive layouts and customizable themes. Leveraged Tailwind CSS for efficient styling, resulting in a visually stunning platform that drives user engagement and brand visibility.
